Text: RE Draft ISDAOntario Power Generation IncI will call Didnt receive attachments though Greg Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To MALCOLM Greg CONTROLLER Cc Subject Draft ISDAOntario Power Generation Inc Dear Greg As we discussed I am attaching our proposed form of ISDA Schedule and Credit Support Annex for your review If you have any comments or questions please do not hesitate to call me at We look forward to hearing from you cc Tom May Ed Sacks Credit Bob Bruce Senior Counsel
